message.content: Assuming that each page is 8.5 x 11 inches, and the paper is 20-pound weight, a standard sheet of paper can hold approximately 75 words per page. If Harmony writes 10 notes per day with an average of 4 lines per note (assuming she uses all available space), that would be 40 words per day or 300 words per week. At this rate, one notepad should last about 2 weeks. However, the actual length of time may vary depending on the thickness and quality of the paper used as well as how heavy the staples are. If Harmony writes more than 4 lines per note or uses thinner paper, it may last longer.
